Appeals Accepted for Review.
Discretionary appeal accepted on Proposition of Law No. I; cause held for the decision in 2008-1693, State v.Arnold, Franklin App. No. 07AP-789, 2008-Ohio-3471; and briefing schedule stayed.
PFEIFER and LUNDBERG STRATTON, JJ., would also accept the appeal on Proposition of Law No. II.
